definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
to elect as/to choose as/to consider as

sentences.english: The minimum allowable values of the energy efficiency and. Energy …
sentences.chinese: 房间空调器机能效限定值与节能评价值。

sentences.english: The content of amylose and protein is significantly negative correlation with it.
sentences.chinese: 直链淀粉和蛋白质含量与综合评价值呈负相关。

sentences.english: Finally, using the linear weighted method, the value evaluating the credit state of high-tech enterprise is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 最后，运用线性加权法获得高技术企业的信用评价值。

sentences.english: The lowest price method shall apply to projects of normatively ordered commodities and general services.
sentences.chinese: 最低评标价法适用于标准定制商品及通用服务项目。

sentences.english: Eg. Don't worry about the reviewers. You're in good hands.
sentences.chinese: 别担心评审会怎么评，你的状况很好。

sentences.english: Application fee for module exemption through assessment.
sentences.chinese: 透过评核试申请单元豁免费用。

sentences.english: All the conferences had greatly advanced the development of liquor production and liquor-making techniques.
sentences.chinese: 历届评酒会都推动了白酒生产和技术的发展。

sentences.english: The teachers failed me on the written composition.
sentences.chinese: 教师们评我的笔头作文不及格。

sentences.english: In 2005 it won the only special gold medal at the Brussels-based International Assessment.
sentences.chinese: 2005年荣获布鲁塞尔国际评酒会唯一特别金奖。

definition: to comment/a point by point commentary
to comment/a point by point commentary
to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
to grade/to mark (student's work)/grade/score (of student's work)
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
